#Problem 1
Create and take the column means of a data frame comprised of:

+ A random sample of size 10 from a uniform[0, 5] distribution
+ A logical vector indicating whether elements of the sample are greater than 2
+ A (length-10) character vector
+ A (length-10) factor vector

```{r warning=FALSE}
set.seed(1)
random_sample = runif(10,0,5)
logic_random_sample = random_sample > 2
char_vec = unlist(strsplit("mynameisYL",""))
fac_char_vec = factor(char_vec, labels = c(1:9))

first_data = cbind(random_sample,logic_random_sample,char_vec,fac_char_vec)
mean_first_data = colMeans(apply(first_data,2,as.numeric))
print(mean_first_data)
```
